articles.title: Rapper King Von's tragic last message to fans before fatal shooting outside club - Mirror Online
articles.description: King Von - real name Dayvon Bennett - was killed during a late-night shoot-out in Atlanda on Friday morning, as fans mourn his loss
articles.content:
Rapper King Von had excitedly told fans about his new music just hours before he was shot dead.
